anemia.overview: A condition where the body has lower than normal hemoglobin or red blood cells.
foods_to_limit: Excess tea or coffee with meals

diabetes.overview: A condition where the body has difficulty regulating blood sugar levels.

hypertension.overview: A condition where blood pressure levels are persistently high.

gastritis.meaning: Gastritis means the lining of the stomach is irritated or inflamed. This can cause discomfort, burning, nausea, or vomiting.
gastritis.why_it_matters: If the stomach lining is inflamed, eating can feel painful and the body may not tolerate food well for a short time.
when_to_seek_help: Symptoms lasting more than a few days

dehydration.meaning: Dehydration means your body does not have enough water and salts to function normally.
dehydration.why_it_matters: Low fluids can cause weakness, dizziness, and can affect blood pressure and kidney function.
common_symptoms: Dark yellow urine or less urine
lifestyle: Seek care if severe symptoms occur

sinusitis.meaning: Sinusitis means the lining of the sinuses (air spaces near the nose) is inflamed. This can cause congestion, facial pressure, and headache.
sinusitis.why_it_matters: Inflamed sinuses can cause discomfort and sometimes infection-like symptoms, especially with cold/allergy triggers.
foods_to_limit: Very cold drinks (if they worsen symptoms)
